title: Lamar Odom's Children Speak Out About Their Father's Hospitalization
text:
​The children of Lamar Odom offered one of their first public comments about their father on Thursday afternoon. In a statement to E! News, 17-year-old Destiny Odom and 13-year-old Lamar Odom, Jr. thanked the public for their support and asked them to continue to pray for the comatose former NBA star.
In a statement, the children said "Thanks for your outpouring of prayers and support for our dad. We are here with our family and friends.We appreciate everyone respecting our privacy at this time. We ask for your continued prayers."
 ​People ​reports on Thursday Destiny also tweeted an old photograph of her with her father, writing " ​Please don't leave us ​." Lamar's children, along with his ex-Liza Morales, were reportedly flown out to Las Vegas by his ex-wife Khloé Kardashian to be by their father's side.
​Lamar was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel on Tuesday, where he had reportedly been partying for four days . A witness told police dispatchers Lamar was seen doing cocaine on Saturday; police obtained a search warrant for Lamar's blood shortly after he was hospitalized. It was also revealed that since they are still technically married , Lamar's may be the sole party responsible for making medical decisions for him. ​
